en: to meet; to expect; to wait for
to close; to conclude (an agreement); to switch off
to be able to, to manage to
to get; to manage; (auxiliary for passive)
to build, to raise, to erect
to lay out; to set (the table); to spread (on)
to put on; to impose; to install
to keep an eye on, to watch; to notice
to drive; to lead; to conduct
to form, to shape, to create
to perform, to carry out, to accomplish
to take, to lead, to transport
to pull, to draw; (colloq.) to wear
